digest_items.title: Use security champions program
digest_items.why: Embedded security advocates improve security culture across teams
digest_items.fix: Designate security champions in each team and provide training

digest_items.title: Use Web Application Firewall (WAF)
digest_items.why: WAF protects against common web attacks like SQL injection and XSS
digest_items.fix: Deploy CloudFlare, AWS WAF, or ModSecurity

digest_items.title: Enable DNSSEC for your domain
digest_items.why: DNSSEC prevents DNS spoofing attacks by cryptographically signing DNS records
digest_items.fix: Contact your DNS provider to enable DNSSEC and add DS records to your registrar

digest_items.title: Verify backup encryption
digest_items.why: Unencrypted backups are a major data breach risk if storage is compromised
digest_items.fix: Enable encryption at rest and in transit for all backup solutions

digest_items.title: Enable MFA for all admin accounts
digest_items.why: Multi-factor authentication prevents account takeover even if passwords are stolen
digest_items.fix: Use authenticator apps (Google Authenticator, Authy) or hardware keys (YubiKey)

digest_items.title: Review firewall rules
digest_items.why: Overly permissive firewall rules expose unnecessary services
digest_items.fix: Apply principle of least privilege and close unused ports

digest_items.title: Implement data classification
digest_items.why: Classification ensures appropriate security controls for sensitive data
digest_items.fix: Label data as public, internal, confidential, or restricted
